slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the 3rd year in a row. The stress of work and life had my mind in a constant fog. I felt like I was losing myself.
slides.image_prompt: Stressed woman sitting at a cluttered desk, head in hands, calendar with missed birthdays circled in red. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: Turns out, I wasn't alone. My sister told me she kept walking into rooms and forgetting why. My husband said he was losing words mid-sentence. We were all struggling to keep up.
slides.image_prompt: Collage of stressed faces - woman with confused expression in doorway, man searching for words. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: But here's what doctors don't tell you - chronic stress doesn't just affect your mind. It can wreak havoc on your entire body. While I was struggling, an ancient solution already existed...
slides.image_prompt: Silhouette of stressed person with glowing red inflammation throughout body. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, dramatic lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: My yoga teacher pulled me aside after class. She told me about an herb called Ashwagandha, used for centuries in Ayurvedic medicine. She said it transformed her life, and the science backed it up.
slides.image_prompt: Serene yoga teacher having heart-to-heart conversation with stressed student in sunlit studio. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: I did some digging and found over 200 research studies on Ashwagandha's incredible benefits. It's been clinically shown to reduce stress, improve focus, and even boost immunity. I had to try it for myself.
slides.image_prompt: Montage of scientific research papers, charts, and graphs showing Ashwagandha's benefits. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, clean lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I was sleeping better. Day 7: My mind felt clearer, more focused. Week 2: I had a newfound sense of calm and resilience. The transformation was unbelievable.
slides.image_prompt: Timeline showing woman's transformation - sleeping peacefully, focused at work, smiling serenely. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: Even my skeptical husband was amazed. "You're like a new person," he said. My mom started asking what my secret was. She could see the difference in my energy and outlook.
slides.image_prompt: Husband looking amazed at wife's transformation, mother-daughter having heartfelt conversation. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: Now, I have the focus to tackle my to-do list with ease. I have the resilience to bounce back from setbacks. And I have the presence to show up for the people I love. Ashwagandha gave me my life back.
slides.image_prompt: Woman confidently leading a meeting, hugging her family, practicing yoga with a serene smile. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format.

slides.script: That's why I'm thrilled to share Goli Ashwagandha Gummies. Goli has harnessed the power of this ancient herb in a delicious, organic, plant-based gummy. It's the only Ashwagandha gummy with the clinical dose of KSM-66® used in research.
